name: Final Dragon
description:
You are the Final Dragon.

The knights, wizards, archers, and rogues have killed all of your family and friends in the kingdom. The only thing left for you to do now is get revenge. Defeat the powerful knights and wizards in 8 different worlds to conquer the almighty king.

Worlds of Final Dragon:
1) Kingdom
2) Grassland
3) Forest
4) Desert
5) Jungle
6) Grove
7) Snow
8) Castle

Revenge will be yours!

Final Dragon is inspired by the Japanese RPG's (JRPG) of the late 80's and early 90's. For the first time ever, you can play as the dragon. Final Dragon is not a turn-based game, it utilizes a real-time battle engine. Final Dragon uses a 3D engine capable of displaying 2D sprites at high frame rates.
